metadata.title: CVE-2023-41993 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOSSonoma 14. Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploitedagainst versions of iOS before iOS 16.7.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
